root: ^The light is so bright! What am I doing on this farm?
^We grew you in the hopes you would help bring some life back into the farm! You're definitely... lively.
^Well, I'm definitely alive. What is this lingering <color=purple>gloom?</color> It's cooling my fire!
^An evil witch called the Seed Sorceress has cast a curse on the land! She's draining all of your powers. We have to stop her!
^I suppose you might be able to use this spell... You can burn things like thorns down  with it, and if you find any torches you can burn those too!
^To use the Chili Fire Spell press down on the directional pad.
